items.text: full but enough time to turn away, pushed into the off side
items.shortText: de Silva to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: shouts of catch but in front of long-off. Turns away and messes up his lofted stroke as he chips it off the outside of the bat
short and wide, cut to sweeper cover
items.shortText: de Silva to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.preText:
Dananjaya back for his last over

Ferdous: "Bangladesh is passing its golden era with fantastic 5, they should prolong this as long as possible meanwhile nourish the young star like Miraz, saifuddin, musaddek and mustfiz to the lead the future. "

items.text: short of a length, straying on the pads, tucked to square leg
short, not much width but he makes some by advancing down the ground, gets on top and slaps it through extra cover
slower length ball outside off, waits and opens the face to third man
just over the keeper. Pre-medidates a shuffle and the bowler drags the pace back but he gets down and scoops it just over the outstretched left hand of Dickwella
items.shortText: Pradeep to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: short ball, swivels around with a quick pull to deep backward square leg. Picks the gap to come back for a second. And that's fifty for Rahim. Valuable knock. He needs to stay till the end
short of a length outside off, no pace again, waits before steering it down to third man
gets down for a big slog but it's a tad too full and he hammers it along the ground to deep midwicket
items.shortText: de Silva to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: extremely full on off, squeezed out through the covers
length ball on middle, susses it out early and walks across for another scoop right over the keeper. Lack of pace means it won't carry to the boundary
items.shortText: de Silva to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

items.text: too full, slog-swept on the bounce to deep midwicket
items.shortText: de Silva to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run
